column4: If anyone here is familiar with VOCPROC (auto-tuner), I'm having trouble actually getting it going? I know it says it's an "LV2 plugin" but I'm not sure exactly what that means or what I have to do to run it..
lv2 plugins are hosted in other programs, you need to use a recording app or another host with it
other programs such as? I have Ardour, I assumed that would do it?
i don't know personally,  but yes; the recording apps pretty much support all the plugin types there are on linux, lv2 and whatever the other 2 are
